markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Exploration](/Traits.aspx?ID=595)</title>

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 456 <sup>2.0</sup>

An activity with this trait takes more than a turn to use, and can usually be used only during exploration mode.
name: Exploration
